alldb.table_sql: select ci.ID as id, cust.id as custid,--客户id faic.DOC_ID as docid, --流水號 ci.proj_id as projid, --项目id ci.project_name as projectname,--项目名称 ci.CONTRACT_ID as contractid, --合同号 ci.CONTRACT_PUT_NUMBER as contractputnumber,--业务合同号 cust.cust_name as custname, --客户名 -- cust2.cust_name as custdealer,--经销商 cc.EQUIP_AMT as equipamt,--设备款 cc.FIRST_PAYMENT as firstpayment,--首付款 cc.INCOME_NUMBER as incomenumber,--还租次数 dicts1.name_ as incomenumberyear ,--付租类型 dicts2.name_ as periodtype,--付租方式 cc.START_DATE as startdate,--起租日期 cc.YEAR_RATE as yearrate,--利率 cc.IRR as irr,--内部收益率 faic.RATE_ORIGINAL as rateoriginal,--调息前利率 faic.RATE_ADJUST as rateadjust,--调息后利率 faic.OLD_IRR as oldirr, --调息前内部收益率 faic.NEW_IRR as newirr --调息后内部收益率 from FUND_ADJUST_INTEREST_CONTRACT faic left join contract_info ci on faic.CONTRACT_ID = ci.ID left join contract_condition cc on ci.id = cc.contract_id left join cust_info cust on ci.cust_id = cust.id --left join CUST_INFO cust2 on ci.CUST_DEALER = cust2.id left join t_dicts_datas dicts1 on (cc.INCOME_NUMBER_YEAR=dicts1.id_) left join t_dicts_datas dicts2 on (cc.PERIOD_TYPE=dicts2.id_) where faic.adjust_id ='{adjustid}' and faic.mod_reason='his_rate_change' and faic.status_='rate_change_in'
